display_long_description:
**Cake_player** is the only way to view the delicious futuristic media format 'Light Field Layered Depth Video', packing up to eight layers of gooey volumetric goodness into a delicious treat you can view in all six glorious degrees of freedom!

**Key Features:**
- **Exclusive 6DoF technology:** Cake_player is the **ONLY** way to view video from experimental Light Field camera arrays, allowing you to move around and view movies from multiple angles.
- **Layered Depth Video:** The latest in occlusion-free 6DoF viewing, also allows for reflections and transparency!
- **Passthrough Mixed-Reality:** Watch volumetric videos in your own room. Put a portal on your wall to another place!

Prepare your appetite for **Cake Player**, the only Light Field Layered Depth Video player. Try a slice of the future of movies today!

**(May only work in the United States due to video hosting issues)**
